title: Amazon to Require All U.S. Warehouse Workers to Wear Masks Again
sub_head: Spread of Covid-19’s Omicron variant spurs tech giant to institute its latest change in mask rules
body:
Amazon.com Inc. said all workers at its hundreds of U.S. warehouses will have to wear masks again starting Wednesday, a mandate prompted by the rapid spread of the coronavirus’s Omicron variant.
Amazon, the nation’s second-largest private employer, behind Walmart Inc., had previously only required warehouse staff to wear masks if they weren’t vaccinated against Covid-19 or worked in jurisdictions where face coverings were required indoors.
